DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate use Assessment Chronic Migraine Impacts ( ACM-I ) Questionnaire assess impact benefit treatment onabotulinumtoxinA ( BOTOX® ) adults chronic migraine .
DOC.brief_title: Use Treatment Benefit Questionnaire Patients With Chronic Migraine Treated With OnabotulinumtoxinA ( BOTOX® )
DOC.criteria: History chronic migraine least 6 month prior screen visit Fifteen headache day 4week screening period ( ≥4 headache episode last ≥4 hour ≥50 % headache day migraine ) Conditions cause chronic facial pain Temporomandibular Disorder ( TMD ) fibromyalgia Use headache prophylaxis medication within 4 week screen visit Diagnosis Myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert Syndrome , Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis Previous use botulinum toxin serotype reason Skin infection acne would interfere injection site Acupuncture , transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) , cranial traction , dental splint headache , nociceptive trigeminal inhibition , occipital nerve block treatment , injection anesthetics/steroids within 4 week screen .
